Author: ngunguru
Text: I have this (except the laxative part) so I don't use it all that much, maybe 1 hit every few days, if that. If it doesn't feel right I would stop it honestly. It's not gonna lead you on a good path in the long run anyway.

Author: timid_soup
Text: That's just from the nicotine, your body is not used to it.  If you used a lower dose (like 3% nicotine pods if you use a juul) of nicotine in your vape and you should be fine.   I do not recommend using tobacco/vapes to help curb your appetite. I started smoking because of that, and here I am 15 years later addicted to nicotine. It's an expensive and unhealthy habit that I wish I had never started. I'm recovered from my ED, but haven't been able to kick to habit of smoking. I've been able to switch from cigs to vaping, which better for me/my lungs, but is still not healthy, nor cheap.
